elements.description:
### Usage

    <px-inbox list-items='[{"id":"1","title":"GT Vibration","subtitle":"Block 2","severity":"important","date":"2016-10-05T01:29"}]'>
      // define or bind to detail view here
    </px-inbox>

### Styling
The following custom properties are available for styling. See also px-alert-label for the variables to use for the badge icons.

Custom property | Description | Default
:----------------|:-------------|:----------
`--px-inbox-list-width` | Width of the list portion of the inbox | 320px
`--px-inbox-height` | Height of the full inbox component | 100vh
`--px-inbox-border-color` | Border color for list items |
`--px-inbox-secondary-text-color` | Text color for subtitle and date |
`--px-inbox-li-background-color` | Background color for list items |
`--px-inbox-li-background-color--hover` | Background color for list item when hovered |
`--px-inbox-li-background-color--selected` | Background color for selected list item |
`--px-inbox-li-text-color--selected` | Text color for selected list item |

properties.name: _parentResizable
properties.description: The closest ancestor element that implements `IronResizableBehavior`.

properties.name: _notifyingDescendant
properties.description:
True if this element is currently notifying its descendant elements of
resize.

properties.name: language
properties.description:
A valid IETF language tag as a string that `px-localize-behavior` will
use to localize this component. Refer to px-localize-behavior for
currently supported languages.

See https://github.com/PolymerElements/app-localize-behavior for API
documentation and more information.

properties.name: resources
properties.description: List of strings needing to be localized for this component.
properties.defaultValue: {"en":{"Back":"Back","Sort by":"Sort by","Search":"Search","Title":"Title","Subtitle":"Subtitle","Severity":"Severity","Date":"Date","years ago":"years ago","a year ago":"a year ago","months ago":"months ago","a month ago":"a month ago","days ago":"days ago","a day ago":"a day ago","hours ago":"hours ago","an hour ago":"an hour ago","minutes ago":"minutes ago","a minute ago":"a minute ago","a few seconds ago":"a few seconds ago"}}

properties.name: formats
useKeyIfMissing
properties.description:
Use the key for localization if value for language is missing. Should
always be true for our components

properties.name: localize
properties.description:
Translates a string to the current `language`. Any parameters to the
string should be passed in order, as follows:
`localize(stringKey, param1Name, param1Value, param2Name, param2Value)`

properties.name: bubbleEvent
properties.description: If true, will bubble up the event to the parents

properties.name: __localizationCache
properties.description:
Internal singleton cache. This is the private implementation of the
behaviour; don't interact with it directly.

properties.name: listItems
properties.description: Array of items to include in the list. Each item in the array should be an object with the following keys: - id - must be a string, used to update the `selectedItem` property when an item is selected - title - subtitle - severity - one of "important", "error", "warning", or "information" - date - optional, should be valid 8601 date strings

properties.name: selectedItem
properties.description:
ID of the selected item. Set this property to update the selected item,
or listen for changes to observe when the user selects an item.

properties.name: selectedItemRef
properties.description:
Reference to the selected item object, updated when a new item is
selected. Read-only, set `selectedItem` to change what's selected

properties.name: disableSearch
properties.description: Disables search ability.

properties.name: _query
properties.description: Search query used to filter the list.

properties.name: disableSort
properties.description: Disables sort ability.

properties.name: sortBy
properties.description:
Determines how the inbox list is sorted. Updated automatically when the
user selects a new item from the sort by dropdown. Choose from one of
the following values to set through data binding:
"Title" | "Subtitle" | "Severity" | "Date"

properties.name: sortOrder
properties.description:
Sets the sort order for the inbox list. Updated automatically when the
user clicks the arrow button to toggle the sort order. Choose from one
of the following values to set through data binding:
"ascending" | "descending"

properties.name: disableAutoSelect
properties.description:
By default, the first item in `listItems` will be selected when the
`listItems` property is changed. Set this flag to `true` to disable
the auto select behavior. This property must be set before `listItems`
is first set, or the first item may be selected anyway. Its recommended
to set this as a static attribute on the px-inbox tag to ensure it
is set before the `listItems` are first set.

properties.name: _isCollapsed
properties.description: Set to `true` when the inbox is collapsed on mobile screen sizes.

properties.name: _detailViewActive
properties.description:
On small screens the user can navigate back and forth between a detail
view showing the message contents, and a list view showing the inbox
items. This boolean manages the visible state.

methods.name: notifyResize
methods.description:
Can be called to manually notify a resizable and its descendant
resizables of a resize change.

methods.name: assignParentResizable
methods.description:
Used to assign the closest resizable ancestor to this resizable
if the ancestor detects a request for notifications.

methods.name: stopResizeNotificationsFor
methods.description:
Used to remove a resizable descendant from the list of descendants
that should be notified of a resize change.

methods.name: resizerShouldNotify
methods.description:
This method can be overridden to filter nested elements that should or
should not be notified by the current element. Return true if an element
should be notified, or false if it should not be notified.

params.name: element
params.description:
A candidate descendant element that
implements `IronResizableBehavior`.

return.desc: True if the `element` should be notified of resize.

methods.name: __computeLocalize
methods.description: Returns a computed `localize` method, based on the current `language`.

methods.name: _setInitialSelectedItem
methods.description: Selects an inbox item when the component is first instantiated.

methods.name: _handleItemTapped
methods.description: Selects an item when the user taps on it.

methods.name: _handleShowListView
methods.description: Returns the user to the inbox list view in collapsed mode.

methods.name: _calculateBounds
methods.description:
When the window or any parent container is resized, recalculates the bounds
of the px-inbox and decide if the inbox is collapsed. Show the list and
detail views side-by-side when not collapsed, and toggle back and forth
between then when collapsed.

methods.name: _computeFilter
methods.description: Searches through the list titles and subtitles and filters based on the query.

methods.name: _handleReverseSort
methods.description: Reverses the sort order for the component.

methods.name: _computeSort
methods.description: Sort function for the array of list items.

methods.name: _updateShadowScrollClassName
methods.description:
When the user scrolls the inbox list, add a class to show a shadow
to indicate some items are not visible.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description:
A valid IETF language tag as a string that `px-localize-behavior` will
use to localize this component. Refer to px-localize-behavior for
currently supported languages.

See https://github.com/PolymerElements/app-localize-behavior for API
documentation and more information.

attributes.description: List of strings needing to be localized for this component.

attributes.name: formats
use-key-if-missing
attributes.description:
Use the key for localization if value for language is missing. Should
always be true for our components

ID of the selected item. Set this property to update the selected item,
or listen for changes to observe when the user selects an item.

events.name: app-localize-resources-error
events.description: Fired when the resources cannot be loaded due to an error.

events.name: app-localize-resources-loaded
events.description: Fired after the resources have been loaded.
